definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: At present, homophonic transliteration has become a fashion in the translation of trademarks.
sentences.chinese: 時下，諧音譯在商標翻譯中成爲一種時髦。

sentences.english: American liquor companies are finding inspiration in the financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 時下，美國酒商從經濟危機中發現了商機。

sentences.english: Overall, British prices have only fallen about 12% from the peak.
sentences.chinese: 總體而言，英國房價僅比峯值時下跌了12%左右。

sentences.english: Nowadays has brought economic development and cultural prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 時下經濟的發展戴來了文化的繁榮。

sentences.english: Today, most people drive cars produced by large auto makers.
sentences.chinese: 時下，絕大多數民衆開的車都是由汽車大廠所生產的。

sentences.english: You know nothing! It is the most popular element .
sentences.chinese: 你懂什麼？這是時下最流行的元素。

sentences.english: It sprinkled rain late in the afternoon.
Radical feminism is currently the fashionable topic among the chattering classes.
sentences.chinese: 激進的女權主義是時下名嘴階層熱議的話題。

sentences.english: Because there is homophonic , now often confused.
sentences.chinese: 因爲兩者是諧音，時下往往混淆。

sentences.english: It seems like a lot more women are deciding to have babies much later these days.
sentences.chinese: 時下看起來好像很多女士都傾向於晚育。

sentences.chinese: 還有時下用刑的情況，非常有意思。

sentences.english: But "change" is the mantra of the moment.
sentences.chinese: 但是“改變”已經成爲時下的主流口號。

sentences.english: The popular tour of the season is a 11-Day Tour to Europe.
sentences.chinese: 時下熱門的旅遊線路是歐洲11日遊。

sentences.english: Today, the democratic is a ideality which has been accepted by everybody in the world.
sentences.chinese: 而時下，民主作爲一種理想，已爲世人所普遍接受。

sentences.english: From the evening rain today, cease after the faint moonlight climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時下起一場雨，停息之後，有月光淡淡爬上樹梢。

sentences.english: The market did recover later in the afternoon to close down about 5 percent.
sentences.chinese: 在稍後的下午，市場開始回升，閉盤時下跌了5%。
